Name: Life on the hook
About the game: Life on the hook - is a short story about the cycle of life in which you, as a fisherman named Hrafn, begin your journey remembering the old days. Immerse yourself in the short story of the life of a lonely fisherman named Hrafn, based on exploration and searching for items. Relax and enjoy the story of the game, where you'll get nothing but peace! Feature of game: - A small game for 30 minutes - Good soundtrack - Soulful story of a man's life - A glimpse from the outside: how many moments in life a person misses by the eye and only in old age does he reflect on the past. CHECK OUT MORE
